thread.title: Cyclocross state championships set for Oct. 31 in Buffalo - City & Region
thread.title_full: Cyclocross state championships set for Oct. 31 in Buffalo - City & Region - The Buffalo News

author: buffalonews
title: Cyclocross state championships set for Oct. 31 in Buffalo - City & Region
text:
Cyclocross bicycle racers from around the state will be in Buffalo’s LaSalle Park on Oct. 31 to compete in the 2015 state championships.
The spectator-friendly style of bicycle racing, popular in Europe, takes place on courses that are somewhat between mountain biking and road racing. Admission is free for spectators.
This is the first time the championships are being held in this region.
There will be several championship events, based on ability level, gender and age. Presented by Plan2Peak Endurance Sport Coaching in Amherst, the day’s first race begins at 11 a.m.
